text: 6.6 Gal 5.24, 6.14, Epe 4.22, Kol 2.11, 3.5, 3.9 Chɨn anɨgɨl nopun, chɨn pel tɨmel golɨgɨpun ak, Klays mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lel kumak anɨb bad ak pugɨlɨkak. Anɨgek, tap si tap tɨmel gep ak kɨles ne chɨnop kodolɨgup ak kul gup. Ak nɨm chɨn tap si tap tɨmel gep ak, binɨb wog gɨñeb ne tek kɨdek gɨnɨgun okok mɨñɨl ma mɨdobun.
